  • BORN TO
    CREATE
    We sculpt good brands, sketch strategic
    direction while propel creative campaigns
    to actual sales
    IMAGINE, there are millions of blocks of stones.
    But only one is worth of Sculptor’s attention. He envisioned
    the most beautiful essence of object with pencil on paper. Then,
    through long cutting pain, lots of dust and thoughts a brilliant
    Sculpture eventually finds its life shape.
    That’s called the BRAND.
    It’s carefully crafted to fulfill special astonishing mission —
    MAKE HUMAN LIVES BETTER.
  • WHAT WE DO
    I

    Brand Sculpting

    We bring brands to life by carving its’ strategy, direction, vision and communication plans, & sculpt in beautiful form and image.
    • Brand Creation
    • Brand Recreation
    • Brand Positioning & Communication
    • Brand Essence
    		 II

    Product Sculpting

    We innovate, create, optimize risks, tell stories, plan new invasions to countries, markets and retail. We design products that make lives better.
    • New product Innovation
    • New Product Line in Existing Family
    • Product Planning on Market Invasion
    • Product Communication
    		 III

    Experience Sculpting

    We attract consumers, make them feel the brand, educate teams about branding and experiment with new technologies.
    • Retail / Space Experience
    • Digital Presence
    • Workshops and Brand Labs
  • OUR
    WORKS
    Brand Sculpting / Product Sculpting

    Belo Granola

    Flavors development, Brand Audit, Packaging, Identity and Guidelines, Brand Strategy, Communication Kick-Off Plan

    Explore

    Challenge

    Belo Granola is young company specializing in production of seven different flavors of granola. By the way, very delicious! Market is very saturated and granola trend was decreasing for the last couple of years. BELO is struggling to create product that will stand up among competitors on grocery shelves, farmers markets and small boutiques and mainly will tell consumers about unique flavors and culture of the company and its eco-principles.

    Result

    SCULPTOS team developed unique concept of brand and overall strategy for later morning products line expansion. Now Belo Granola has a vision how to jumpstart through detailed Marketing plan.We also created eco and kids-friendly packaging and design for all seven flavors, required sales print and digital collateral.

    Brand Sculpting

    UBU

    Carving Brand Strategy and creative Identity

    Explore

    Challenge

    Unusual Babe Undercover is Los Angeles based premier producer of organic cotton lingerie for women and teen clothes for night time. Originally UBU launched production about 30 years ago under another name and successfully was in majority of clothing retail stores like Neiman Marcus and Nordstorm. unfortunately 2008’ economic crisis broke the brand apart. Now UBU is striving to establish position with a new name on online market, and breakthrough again. Still keeping both organic product and minority women support as main pillars in business culture.

    Result

    Building friendly relationships with the owner SCULPTOS felt how real girl feels herself wearing different types of lingerie. Those insights armored us with a base for sculpting UBU’s Brand Essence. We defined positioning, cleared offering for each product, found what kind of ladies to target, and mainly uncovered brand message and character. Our team crafted brand vision for the company, defined its’ values and guiding principles in order to breathe life in products again. After all we created visual identity including packaging, logo, essential sales collateral for startup that will be used systematically across all operational process. We love helping this company to succeed, it is worth it!

    Fish Delights

    Explore

    Challenge

    Total business operation of young seafood & deli company in San Diego is built on Facebook sales. Company was in need of good image and improving system of active online selling process.

    Result

    We refreshed page’s design and description, posted constantly brand-new content containing bright product photography and “How-to” videos mixed with creative posters for contests.

  • OUR
    WORKS
    Brand Experience

    CNL TV Channel

    Bringing TV Studios to life, conducting daily live broadcasts

    Explore

    Challenge

    CNL TV Channel is Russian Christian broadcasting network with media coverage across 150 countries. The team is expanding and building new offices and TV studios globally.

    Result

    Throughout several years of friendship and constant technical assistance together we built two independent studios in Seattle and San Diego. Happily we were executing construction planning, and mainly technical planning and procurement, installations and remodeling for the last 4 years. Our production director makes daily live broadcasts in SD location featuring pastor’s preaching through TV channel and internet. Studios serve as a place for local and invited guests, evangelists and Christian personas.

  • OUR
    WORKS
    Brand Experience

    Flame of Fire

    Directing LIVE Broadcast, Consulting, Video Production

    Explore

    Challenge

    Flame of Fire Ministry is christian ministry located in Sacramento, CA. The team was developing brand new TV studio during the last year for broadcasting christian programs. Production director from SCULPTOS was assigned to plan and direct LIVE from grand opening program ceremony.

    Result

    Preparation to the Opening Day was organized though it was the first experience for the team from Flame Ministry in LIVE directing at such a big scale. Alex Maximov (Production Director) led the technical team, advised on future procurement of equipment.

    Polina Art

    I love to help numerous business owners with main things: “VISUALIZE. CREATE. BUILD”. During past 8 years Polina was Brand Manager at Nestle, Marketing Specialist at Coca-Cola, where she helped to launch several brands nationally, collaborated with lots of creative agencies including Ogilvy PR, McCann, led marketing activities at boutique agency MMG in Los Angeles. “Today at SCULPTOS we’re fully dedicated to carving brands with Purpose for better future.”

    Alex Maximov

    Alex is passionate about structuring everything around technology. He built several television studios participating from construction steps to actual technical planning and equipment procurement and conducting daily live broadcasts at TV Channel. He collected so much expertise during these 6 years that now consults other entrepreneurs on developing independent studios and scaling video streaming businesses.

    Lena Pozdnyakova

    Lena graduated with BA in Architecture from Sheffield University ( UK) and MA in Architecture with distinction from DIA ( Germany). Both programs were completed with full funded scholarships. She has worked on design projects UrbanDATA Design Buro in Shanghai (China) and as part of team in 3Gatti Branch in Shanghai(China). Since 2011 Lena is actively involved in graphic design and art project. As a designer and artist she has on-going projects with Soros Foundation, Friedrich-Ebert-Stiftung, Goethe Institute and British Council.

    Tatyana Kim

    Tatyana’s passion lies in “tangible arts” which she applies to all of her works, whether it is commercials, films or music. After being employed as a copywriter by the local branch of the international advertising agency Y&R in Asia, Tatyana fell in love with the short format of storytelling and now provide creative vision and focus to each campaign.

    Kamila Pletneva

    I have incredible instincts for consumer insights, because I wonder about what makes people tick, what motivates them and why they behave a certain way. Moreover, I am always ready to go the extra mile to complete projects.

    Alexander Koshevy

    >> САША НАПИШИ, РОДИ ДВА ГЕНИАЛЬНЫХ ПРЕДЛОЖЕНИЯ.

    Скоро!

    Fumi Matsubara

    Fumi Matsubara is a digital marketing strategist with over a 15+ years of experience in all facets of digital marketing. Fumi has helped numerous companies and brands, big and small to get results online. He is passionate about digital marketing and entrepreneurship, and loves to think, write & converse about search, web presence optimization, and startups.
